name: Luís Paulo Braga
tagline: Programmer. Pleasure in learning. Determination in the completion of projects.
body:
Luís Paulo Braga.
  Native of Rio de Janeiro, 16 years old, attending the 2nd year of high school. Concomitantly attending a technical course sometimes program and game development.

    Programmer:
  I have experience in languages such as JavaScript and C #. But do not stop there. I am learning and Development is a few things in Arduino and I'm learning PHP and MySql (for structures that require database).

    Gaming Developer:
  I have total capacity of developing games. I can write, plan and design a whole game. Game Designer own notions and some notions as an artist. For example I do some simple models in Blender, and also do animations with it. 2d to create content using Adobe Illustrator.
  To program and to share the game have domain in the Unity 3D engine. For now in versions 4.6x. But soon I will be dominating the newest version 5.0x .

    Educational institution
I'm a student NAVE (Center of Advanced Education) that integrates disciplines of mainstream education and disciplines of technological education. These disciplines that make me who I am and what I know. I have great teachers and a great incentive foundation CESAR (Recife Center for Advanced Studies and Systems) and my teachers to publish and produce games and applications ever aimed at the public with educational and social nature.

    Luís Paulo on the internet
Gmail: lpaulobos2010@gmail.com    
Outlook: luis.silva@cejoseleitelopes.com.br
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/luispaulo.bragadeoliveiradasilva
Google +: https://plus.google.com/101434216702504497791
GitHub: https://github.com/lpaulobos
